articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Co-op Farm
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-the-spot guidance to the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County.
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					Kim Jong Il looked round the monument to President Kim Il Sung's field guidance and the room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 He recalled with deep emotion the proud course covered by the farm, saying that the farm, which was once called a barren land, a place unfit for human inhabitation, had turned into a paradise of happiness enjoying rich harvest under the wise leadership and meticulous care of the President.
					
					 Being briefed on the farm before the map on its panoramic view, he learned in detail about the construction of the farm village.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the village has been turned into a beautiful rural town, after looking at the modern dwelling houses lined up at the foot of Mt. Tongbong and cosy and neat school, kindergarten, people's hospital, cultural hall, shop and other cultural and welfare facilities.
					
					 Going round the Tongbong shop located in the heart of the village, he learned about the supply of commodities to the farmers and indicated the orientation and ways for further improving the supply of goods.
					
					 He met and had a cordial talk with Mun Kum Nyo, a woman of merit in the Songun era, and highly praised her for having faithfully discharged her duty as a workteam head for decades.
					
					 One of the most important problems in opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation is to boost the agricultural production, he said, advancing the tasks to be fulfilled by the farm.
					
					 The main factor that helped radically increase the farm produce on the Tongbong Co-op Farm in recent years lies in the fact that the farm has thoroughly implemented the policy of bringing about innovation in the selection of seed, he said, stressing the need to steadily push ahead with the drive to introduce the good seeds suited to the climate and soil of the farm by giving full play to the creativeness of the officials and agricultural working people.
					
					 He said that a key to solving the food problem in our country where crop area is circumscribed is to decisively increase the per-hectare grain yield. To this end, it is necessary to steadily increase the fertility of soil and, at the same time, do farming on a scientific and technological basis as required by the Juche method of farming, he stressed.
					
					 The comprehensive mechanization of agriculture should be realized to successfully ease the strain on the labor force in keeping pace with the steady increase of the level of intensification and scientification of agriculture, he said, showing deep love and benevolence for the farm by making it sure that necessary machines are provided.
					
					 Noting that a solid foundation for radically boosting the agricultural production has been laid through the dynamic drive for rural construction in different parts of the country in recent years of trials and hardships, he said that this signal achievement serves as a sure guarantee for successfully building a thriving nation by finally solving the agricultural problem, the problem of peasants and the rural question in our country.
					
					 He said: The three revolutions are being dynamically carried out in the countryside and the support to it and the state guidance to the co-op farms have been intensified. Thus, the assimilation of farmers to the working class and the industrialization of agriculture have been rapidly realized and the appearance of the countryside renewed with each passing day, considerably decreasing the distinctions between towns and the countryside.
					
					 This is a vivid manifestation of the validity and the great vitality of the socialist rural theses set forth by the President and the advantageous socialist agricultural system in our country, he said.
					
					 Stating that the drive for rural construction is a sacred work to turn our countryside into affluent and modern socialist countryside equipped with state-of-the-art technology, he called for directing sustained and big efforts to it.
					
					 The agricultural front is one of the major fronts for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, he said, urging the whole country and all the people to continue concentrating all-out efforts on farming so as to bring about a radical turn in the agricultural production.

articles.title: New Year's Cards to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
New Year's Cards to Foreign Party and State Leaders
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent New Year's cards to party and state leaders of different countries on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 The cards were sent to: President Hu Jintao, Vice-President Xi Jinping and Jiang Zemin of China, Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, and Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of Russia, Choummaly Saynasone, president of Laos and general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, Nong Duc Manh, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, Michel Suleiman, president of Lebanon, Mohamed Nasheed, president of Maldives, Than Shwe, chairman of the Myanmar State Peace and Development Council, Nambariin Enkhbayar, president of Mongolia, Iajuddin Ahmed, president of Bangladesh, Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria and regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party, Hun Sen, prime minister of Cambodia, King Bhumibol Adulyadej and Crown Prince Maha Vajiralongkorn of Thailand, Asif Ali Zar dari, president of Pakistan, Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, president of Philippines, Emomali Rahmon, president of Tajikistan, Gurbankuli Berdimuhammedov, president of Turkmenistan, Serge Sarkissian, president of Armenia, Abdullah II, king of Jordan, Islam Karimov, president of Uzbekistan, Ali Abdullah Saleh, president of Yemen, Albert, king of Monaco, Aleksandr Lukashenko, president of Belarus, Stipe Mesic, president of Croatia, Filip Vujanovic, president of Montenegro, Blaise Compaore, president of Burkina Faso, James Alix Michel, president of Seychelles, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, 					 His New Year's cards also went to the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who is secretary general of the "International Kim Il Sung Prize" Council, the secretary general of the United Nations, the chairman of the Committee of the African Union, the secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, the mayors of Moscow and Khabarovsk and the governors of Khabarovsk Territory and Maritime Territory.

articles.title: Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Equatorial Guinean President
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, President of Equatorial Guinea, on Jan. 28 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea.
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message said that the two countries have strengthened the mutual political support and steadily expanded the economic and cultural cooperation for the last four decades since the establishment of diplomatic relations, adding that it positively contributed to accomplishing the common cause for defending the sovereignty of the countries from all sorts of challenges of foreign forces and achieving the well-being of the peoples.
					
					 In the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would further develop on a new high stage in the future, Kim sincerely wished the president of Equatorial Guinea great success in his noble work for building better Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan President
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mahinda Rajapaksa, President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, on Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the independence of Sri Lanka.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Sri Lanka would grow stronger in several fields, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president greater successes in his noble work for the political stability of the country and national unity.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan PM
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ratnasiri Wickremanawake on Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the independence of Sri Lanka.
					 Sincerely wishing him and the Sri Lankan government greater successes in the efforts to achieve economic development of the country, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger.

articles.title: British Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
British Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A British parliamentary delegation led by Member of the House of Lords David Alton who is chairman of the British-DPRK All-Party Parliamentary Group arrived here today.
					 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-U.K. Friendship Parliamentary Group who is deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Independence Day of Sri Lanka Observed
articles.content:
Independence Day of Sri Lanka Observed
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the independence of Sri Lanka.
					 Present there were members of the DPRK-Sri Lanka Friendship Association including its chairman and working people in the city. 
					
					A speech was made by the chairman and a congratulatory message to the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Successes Made in Scientific Researches
articles.content:
Successes Made in Scientific Researches
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Electronic Materials Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has made many achievements in scientific researches which will substantially contribute to the betterment of the people's living.
					 A research team of the institute manufactured vibrating transport far-infrared dryers which are of weighty significance in production and applied them to basic foodstuff factories and agricultural and stock-breeding farms.
					
					 The units which have introduced the dryer into production saved electric power considerably as compared with the pre-application time while preventing the loss of products.
					
					 The scientists and technicians there have also developed efficient medical apparatuses including far-infrared sterilizer and thermostat and portable far-infrared medical appliance, which are helpful toward the improvement of the working people's health.
					
					 The institute has invented a seed-treatment method by direct-current high-tension, which enables agricultural production units to boost the seed-treatment efficacy with less investment.

articles.title: Collectivism, Mode of Revolution of Korean People
articles.content:
Collectivism, Mode of Revolution of Korean People
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Collectivism is the true picture of Korean-style socialism and mode of revolution peculiar to the Korean people.
					 The Korean people have been able to weather through rigorous difficulties in the revolution unflinchingly and win one victory after another in the foregone and present centuries because they have strictly adhered to collectivism, the life and soul of socialism.
					
					 It is the truth of the times elucidated by the Juche-based revolutionary theory that man, to whom collectivism is intrinsic demand, can exist only when he is active in a social collective and can transform nature and society only by collectivist cooperation of members of  society.
					
					 The history of the world socialist movement gives the serious lesson that socialism makes a leaping progress when collectivism is given full scope and it degenerates gradually and collapses when collectivism is eroded.
					
					 Collectivism has become the inherent moral traits and universal way of life of all the people in the DPRK and the principle of collectivism has become the main principle firmly maintained in all the sectors of socialist construction.
					
					 It is with the might of collectivism that the army and people of Korea have won victory after victory in anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation and wrought miracles in leaping forward to a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the worst adversities over the last 10-odd years.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is demonstrating its grand sight as an invincible bastion, most solid and powerful, in which the headquarters of revolution and the Party, the army and the people form a harmonious whole, the supreme crystallization of collectivism.
					
					 No force on earth can break the single-minded unity which the Korean people treasure more than their own lives.
					
					 The noble collectivist traits prevail in the whole society under the slogan "One for all, all for one!" in Korea where all sectors are pushed forward by the creative power of the entire army and people united by comradely relationship.
					
					 The boundless devotion and mass heroism the Korean people have displayed for the development and prosperity of the collective, helping and pulling each other along, find their traces in the cooperative fields which have taken on new looks as befits the land of socialist Korea,  monumental edifices of the Songun era including the Wonsan Youth Power Station, the Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway and the Youth Hero Motorway and the flames of great upsurge blazing in Kangson and other areas of the country.
					
					 Now the Korean people are working with fortitude to win the final victory of the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation by their own mode of revolution, regarding it the greatest pride to live and struggle under the socialist system where the collectivist demand is fully met.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails Nomination of Kim Jong Il as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails Nomination of Kim Jong Il as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. This is a manifestation of absolute support and trust in him by all the members of the Workers' Party of Korea and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and all other people.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in an editorial.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly great man and distinguished statesman and strategist who adorned his nearly half century-long history of revolutionary leadership with an immortal heroic epic, the editorial says, and continues:
					
					 The glorious path of victory covered by the WPK reflects his energetic leadership.  Every annual of the sacred Songun revolution that has emerged victorious generation after generation is shining with his extraordinary military wisdom and iron will. The history of the Republic characterized by the greatest successes made in the efforts to achieve eternal prosperity is also associated with his total dedication and tireless efforts.
					
					 He represents the destiny and future of our country and nation and a symbol of all victories. This is the unshakable faith our army and people enshrined through their life experiences. 
					
					  He is not only a great guardian who has firmly protected the Republic's sovereign dignity with his iron will and pluck but a prominent leader who has ushered in the great heyday of the country's prosperity with his extraordinary patriotic zeal and a kind-hearted father of all the servicepersons and people as he has glorified the Republic as a country of single-minded unity with his noble virtues.
					
					 He has performed great feats to shine long in the history of the country by steering the WPK and the revolution for several decades. 
					
					 The above-said nomination is an expression of absolute trust and ardent reverence for him enshrined by all the servicepersons in the course of their protracted historic struggle. 
					
					 The DPRK will shed its rays as a socialist state of Juche with invincible might and a dignified and prosperous power as it is led by Kim Jong Il who is the most prominent statesman and the invincible and iron-willed commander in our era.

articles.title: U.S. Entirely to Blame for International Disputes
articles.content:
U.S. Entirely to Blame for International Disputes
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, U.S. Congress adopted a resolution on confirming that Israel has the right to counter attacks of Hamas of Palestine. The U.S. also abstained from voting when a resolution calling for an immediate ceasefire between Israel and Hamas was adopted at the UNSC.
					 Included in the weapons used by Israel for the offensive operations against the Gaza Strip are GPS guided bombs, DIME and underground penetration bombs developed and delivered by the U.S.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says that all these facts indicate the U.S. is, indeed, a wrecker of the world peace and security, a heinous human rights abuser and an arch criminal that has sparked international disputes.
					
					 Israel's invasion of the Gaza Strip this time had something in common with the U.S. invasion of Iraq both in view of a surprise attack Israel mounted and a pretext it used for the invasion in utter disregard of the UN and the international community, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite doubtful that Israel made attacks on the Gaza Strip according to a U.S. scenario.
					
					 The U.S. has zealously patronized Israel, hideous murderer. Such behavior of the U.S. gives a clear answer to the question as to why slogans "Death to the U.S.!" are repeatedly chanted in not a few countries of the world and attacks on the U.S. forces overseas are frequent.
					
					 The U.S. will not be able to escape a stern judgment of history if it keeps wrecking peace and stability, violating human rights and fostering and escalating disputes in different parts of the world while persistently colluding with such allies as Israel.

articles.title: U.S. Military Build-up in Korea and Its Vicinity under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Military Build-up in Korea and Its Vicinity under Fire
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is amassing its air and naval hardware on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity. This indicates that through such frantic arms build-up and intensified military actions in the Asia-Pacific the U.S. seeks to increase its military pressure upon the DPRK and ignite a new war in Korea at any cost. Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 To this end the U.S. regards it as its top priority task to secure an unchallenged edge in the military field. 
					
					 The U.S. is busy pushing ahead with its scenario to mount a surprise preemptive attack and deal a fatal blow at the DPRK after amassing its latest type military equipment on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and rounding off the posture to invade the DPRK. 
					
					 The military moves being taken by the U.S. with the Korean Peninsula as its theatre go to clearly prove that dialogue touted by it is no more than a smokescreen to slacken the vigilance of the DPRK and deceive the international community and the U.S. has already made a policy switchover to the option for solving the problem through a war. 
					
					 This is the very reason why a series of dialogues held between the DPRK and the U.S. have failed to register desired results. 
					
					 The problem between the DPRK and the U.S. remains unsettled due to the latter's attitude of waiting for an opportunity to do harm to the DPRK with a dagger hidden behind its belt.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly understand that its behavior of dealing with the DPRK with a black-hearted intention would get it nowhere. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to make no concession over the issue related to its dignity and security though its issues with the U.S. remain unresolved. 
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to clarify its stand on dialogue or war.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Acts of Treachery Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Acts of Treachery Flayed
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is dead-set against the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. This is a challenge and insult to those Koreans who have unhesitatingly dedicated even their lives to the struggle to achieve the country's reunification, opposed to the division of the country for more than half a century, and the most unpardonable act of treachery aimed at turning the back the wheel of history.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary. It goes on: 
					
					 Since its appearance at a time when all the compatriots were confidently advancing towards a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity the Lee Myung Bak regime has rushed headlong into the moves to bring back the era of fascist dictatorship and the inter-Korean confrontation in total negation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the great programmes for independent reunification. In consequence, the inter-Korean relations have reached the brink of war, leaving neither way to bring them under control nor any hope to improve them. 
					
					 The DPRK followed with patience the challenge the Lee regime made, denying everything positive that had taken place in the inter-Korean relations since the publication of the June 15 declaration after its emergence in south Korea last year and repeatedly advised it to make a genuine policy switchover for the sake of the nation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee group has kept to the road of serving foreign forces, not the road of cooperation between compatriots, and to the road of inter-Korean confrontation, not the road of national unity, lending no ear to the magnanimous urge of the DPRK and its just warnings. 
					
					 The Lee group's persistent opposition to the moves to improve the inter-Korean relations is not simply aimed at perpetuating the division of the country and delaying its reunification. Its gravity lies in that it is a factor of escalating the political and military confrontation between the north and the south and bringing irrevocable national disasters. 
					
					 The DPRK told the south Korean authorities more than once that the inter-Korean relations should be developed on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration on the principle of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The Lee group, however, has worked hard to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, lending a deaf ear to all its advices. This is, in fact, a declaration on severing the relations with it and an undisguised challenge to it. 
					
					 Under this situation, one can hardly speak of national reunification and everything between the north and the south has been brought to naught. The Lee group will be held accountable for this before history and the nation.

articles.title: Lee Group's Unpopular Stand on Tragic Incident Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Group's Unpopular Stand on Tragic Incident Flailed
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The tragedy in Ryongsan of south Korea is not a tragedy that occurred by accident but a tragic murder perpetrated under the unpopular rule of the Lee Myung Bak fascist "pragmatic regime." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Explaining the reason why the tragedy occurred, the proceeding of evacuees' protest and how it was suppressed, the commentary says that traitor Lee is behind the brutal crackdown. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This being a hard reality, "Chongwadae" and the "Grand National Party" gentries have the effrontery to talk about "force behind the scene," openly defending the killers instead of punishing them. This is a revelation of their criminal intention to divert elsewhere the angry public criticism of the perpetrators of the above-said murder and gloss over the case at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group remains unperturbed by the death of innocent people and is keen to pass the buck for it to the victims. This fully discloses its unpopular attitude and stand. 
					
					 It has become clearer that traitor Lee's "pragmatic policy" is nothing but an unpopular fascist rule utterly indifferent to people's lives and interests and a man-killing policy of turning the whole of south Korea into a tundra of human rights and a graveyard of democracy.
					
					 The above-said tragedy teaches the south Korean people once again the bitter lesson that they can neither realize their strong desire for independence, democracy and national reunification nor protect their lives as long as the above-mentioned "fascist regime" is allowed to ride roughshod. 
					
					 The south Korean people's resentment at the Lee group is running high as it has enforced such unpopular misrule since it came to power. 
					
					 Neither appeasement nor deception nor fascist suppression on the part of the group of traitors can calm down the angry south Koreans.

articles.title: Lee's Loudmouthed "Resumption of Red Cross Dialogue" Ridiculed
articles.content:
Lee's Loudmouthed "Resumption of Red Cross Dialogue" Ridiculed
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Recently Lee Myung Bak was reported to have instructed the puppet president of the Red Cross to "resume south-north Red Cross dialogue" and expressed "his hope" that "it would have dialogue with initiative".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday observes: Had Lee felt even an iota of sense of shame, he should have apologized to the nation for having driven the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe before talking about "the resumption of Red Cross dialogue".
					
					 Citing facts to prove that far from doing so, Lee brought to light his ulterior intention to further bedevil the inter-Korean relations this year, blaring that the said relations cannot be improved through cooperation, the commentary goes on:
					
					 What he is seeking through his talk about "resumption of Red Cross dialogue" is to shift the blame for driving the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe onto others and divert elsewhere the bitter criticism of him.
					
					 The sinister aim sought by Lee in calling for the resumption of the above-said dialogue is proved by the fact that he appointed Hyon In Thaek who conceived the watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" aimed at confrontation with fellow countrymen as minister of "Unification" whose job is to handle issues concerning the inter-Korean relations. It is needless to say that Lee's talk is nothing but a deliberate scheme to put a bar on the gate to inter-Korean dialogue. Such being a hard fact, "resumption of Red Cross dialogue" touted by him is a criminal act of mocking at the people's mindset.
					
					 He is working hard to use the issue of resumption of inter-Korean dialogue as a lever for tiding over his ruling crisis.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that inter-Korean dialogue can never be resumed as long as the crafty political swindler remains in power as his deeds do not agree with his words. 
					
					 Lee would be well advised to stop trumpeting about "the resumption of dialogue" as he is not entitled to say anything about it and step down as demanded by the people.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Struggle Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Struggle Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A struggle was staged in Seoul on Sunday to condemn traitor Lee Myung Bak for brutal killing and check the scheme for enacting unpopular laws.
					Attending it were members of the Democratic Labor Party and other political parties, the Solidarity Council of Civic and Public Organizations, the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy and the "Media Action" and bereaved families, over 20,000 in all.
					
					 A rally was held in Chonggye plaza. Speakers there charged that though ten odd days have passed since the tragic incident in Ryongsan, the Lee Myung Bak "government" is busy shifting the blame for the incident on to others while painting a distorted picture of it.
					
					 Expressing irrepressible anger at the authorities who are evading their responsibility for the death of innocent evacuees, they said that Lee Myung Bak is the chief culprit of the tragedy.
					
					 They declared that the people from all walks of life would launch an all-people struggle in unity to check the moves for enacting the undemocratic evil laws intended to deteriorate the people's livelihood.
					
					 Then there was a candlelight event for mourning the dead. The participants called for overthrowing the man-killing "government", saying that it is committing double murder of the victims by mobilizing the prosecution, instead of making apology for the incident.
					
					 What the bereaved families demand is an apology from the "government" and its step to prevent the recurrence of such case, they said, declaring that they would continue the struggle until a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about the case and the punishment of murderers have been made.
					
					 At the end of the rally, they staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Romania
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed with due ceremony at the building of the Romanian Socialist Union on January 28.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the union, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The chairman declared at the ceremony that in the period from February 1 to April 21 they would organize colorful political and cultural events, including seminar, meeting, lecture and round-table talks, and widely introduce through media the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Korean people's struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Released in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Released in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico brought out in pamphlet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" on January 26 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun politics, the Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode of the present era as it has inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms and it is scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and the revolution. The work also expounds the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A round-table talk and a lecture were held in Egypt and Guinea on January 23 and 25 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					  Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Misr Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, said at the round-table talk that February 16 is a meaningful day for the Korean people and the world progressives as it promised the rosy future and brilliant victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung, the pioneer of the cause of independence, into the steadfast guiding idea for the cause of independence, the socialist cause, and has pursued the unique Songun policy, he stressed.
					
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry of Guinea, said at the lecture that the DPRK's tradition of single-minded unity, which can never be found in any other country, has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il. The Korean people's trust and reverence for him are incomparably deep, he added.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is just the unity in ideology and purpose based on the conviction and determination of the army and people to share the will with their leader and devotedly safeguard him, the lecturer stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a dirigentes de partido y Estado de varios paise
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a dirigentes de partido y Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 98 (2009) de la Era Juche el Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio mensaje de felicitacion a los dirigentes del partido y el Estado de varios paises.
					  Entre ellos figuran el Presidente Hu Jintao, el vicepresidente Xi Jinping y Jiang Zemin de la Republica Popular China; Fidel Castro Ruz,  Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba, y Raul Castro Ruz, Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba; Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, Presidente de la Federacion Rusa; Choummaly Saynasone, Secretario General del CC del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao; Nong Duc Manh, Secretario General del  CC del Partido Comunista de Vietnam; Michel Suleiman, Presidente de la Republica del Libano; Mohamed Nasheed, Presidente de la Republica de las Islas Maldivas; Than Shwe, presidente del Consejo Estatal por la Paz y Desarrollo de la Union de  Myanmar; Nambariin Enkhbayar, Presidente de Mongolia; Iajuddin Ahmed, Presidente de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh; Bashar Al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria y secretario regional
					
					  del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe; Hun Sen, primer ministro del gobierno del Reino de Cambodia; el Rey Bhumibol Adulyadej y el principe heredero Maha Vajiralongkorn  del Reino de Tailandia; Asif Ali Zardari, Presidente de la Republica Islamica  de Pakistan; Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, Presidenta de  la Republica de Filipinas; Emomali Rahmon, Presidente de la Republica de Tadjikistan; Gurbankuli Berdimuhammedov, Presidente de Turkmenistan; Serge Sarkissian, Presidente de la Republica de Armenia; Abdullah II, Rey del Reino Hachemita  de Jordania; Islam Karimov, Presidente de la Republica de  Uzbekistan; Ali Abdullah Saleh, Presidente de la Republica de Yemen; Albert, Rey del Principado de Monaco; Aleksandr Lukashenko, Presidente de la Republica de Belarus; Stipe Mesic, Presidente de Croacia; Filip Vujanovic, Presidente de Montenegro; Blaise Compaore, Presidente de Burkina Faso; James Alix Michel, Presidente de la Republica de Seychelles; Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Presid
					
					 ente de la Republica Democratica Popular de Argelia; Girma Wolde-Giorgis, Presidente de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia; Nicholas Liverpool, Presidente de Commonwealth de Dominica; George Maxwell Richard, Presidente de la Republica de Trinidad - Tobago; Sanjaageen Bayar, Presidente del Partido Popular Revolucionario de Mongolia; el presidente general Hadi Utomo y el secretario general Marzuki Alie del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Indonesia; Prakash Karat, secretario general del CC del Partido Comunista de la India (Marxista); Sergei Mironov, presidente de "Rusia Justa" y presidente del Consejo de la Federacion Rusa, y Gennadi Andreyevich Zyuganov, presidente del CC del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa.
					
					  Tambien, el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche quien es el secretario general del Consejo del "Premio Internacional Kim Il Sung", el secretario general de las Naciones Unidas, el Presidente del Comite de la Union Africana, el secretario general del Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Paz de Corea, y los alcaldes de Moscu y Khabarovsk y los gobernadores del Territorio Khabarovsk y del Territorio Litoral, de Rusia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun apoya eleccion de Kim Jong Il como candidato a APS
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun apoya eleccion de Kim Jong Il como candidato a APS
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- La eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como candidato al diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea deviene la manifestacion de absoluto apoyo y confianza en el de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un editorial publicado el dia 3 y continua:
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il es gran hombre sin par y destacado politico y comandante que corono con inmortal epopeya su historia de direccion sobre la revolucion de cerca de medio siglo.
					
					Las huellas de su entusiasta direccion estan registradas en el camino glorioso y victorioso recorrido por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Igualmente, en los anales de la sagrada revolucion del Songun, que marcha victoriosa de siglo en siglo, estan grabadas la extraordinaria perspicacia militar del Dirigente y su ferrea voluntad.
					
					Tambien en la historia de la RPDC, marcada por la incesante prosperidad, estan impregnadas las huellas de gran abnegacion e incansables esfuerzos del Dirigente.
					
					Mediante sus vivencias, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea guardaron en lo profundo del corazon la inconmovible conviccion de que el Dirigente es el destino y futuro de la patria y la nacion y el simbolo de todos los triunfos.
					
					  El es el gran defensor que con su ferrea voluntad y coraje defiende firmemente la dignidad independiente de la RPDC, el distinguido dirigente que con su extraordinario entusiasmo patriotico abre la era de gran prosperidad de la patria y el generoso padre de todo el ejercito y pueblo quien con sus nobles virtudes hace de la RPDC el pais de unidad monolitica.
					
					  Seran grabadas eternamente en los anales de la patria las grandes proezas logradas por el Dirigente al conducir en la cabecera el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana durante varios decenios.
					
					  Por lo tanto, los oficiales y soldados del EPC lo eligieron como candidato al diputado a la XII Legislatura de la APS expresando su absoluta confianza y gran veneracion que acumularon en el corazon durante sus largas luchas practicas de cada etapa de la historia.
					
					  Gracias a la guia del Dirigente, el mas destacado politico de nuestra epoca e invencible comandante de acero, la RPDC esparcira siempre sus brillos del Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio y de la potencia altamente dignificada y prospera.

articles.title: Negar la mejora de relaciones N-S es acto traidor a la nacion
articles.content:
Negar la mejora de relaciones N-S es acto traidor a la nacion
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- La negacion obstinada de la banda de Lee Myung Bak a la mejora de las relaciones con el Norte de Corea es un desafio e insulto a los coreanos que durante mas de medio siglo se opusieron a la division del pais y ofrendaron sin vacilacion hasta su vida para lograr la reunificacion de la patria, y es un gravisimo e imperdonable acto traidor tendente a hacer retroceder la historia.
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					El "poder" de Lee aparecio cuando todos los coreanos allanaban con toda seguridad la nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad, nego totalmente a la Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que son grandes plataformas para la reunificacion independiente y reedito la epoca de dictadura fascista persiguiendo solo la confrontacion con el Norte debido a lo cual las relaciones N-S llegaron al borde de la guerra y no existe esperanza ni metodo de remediar esta gravisima situacion.
					
					Tratamos con paciencia los actos que hizo el "poder" de Lee aparecido el ano pasado al negar todo lo positivo ocurrido en las relaciones N-S despues del 15 de Junio y le aconsejamos reiteradamente que emprendiera un viraje de politica en favor de los intereses de la nacion.
					
					Pero, la banda de Lee respondio con oidos sordos a la magnanima demanda y las justas advertencias de la parte norte y tomo el camino de seguimiento a las fuerzas foraneas y de la confrontacion con el Norte en lugar de la cooperacion nacional y la unidad nacional.
					
					La obstinada negacion de la banda de Lee a la mejora de las relaciones N-S hace perdurar la division del pais y retardar la reunificacion nacional. La gravedad de la cuestion reside en que su negacion es un factor que agrava la confrontacion politico-militar entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y que acarrea la calamidad nacional irremediable.
					
					Hablamos en reiteradas ocasiones a las autoridades surcoreanas de que las relaciones N-S deben promoverse en el principio de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y sobre la base de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Sin embargo, Lee desoyo todas las advertencias nuestras y prosiguio obstinadamente la confrontacion con el Norte. De veras, esto es una declaracion de dar espaldas al Norte y un abierto desafio a este. Bajo esta situacion de hoy, es insignificante hablar de la reunificacion de la patria y se reducia a nada todo lo que existia entre el Norte y el Sur. La banda de Lee debe asumir la responsabilidad de ello ante la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun inculpa a Lee Myung Bak de la tragedia de Ryongsan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun inculpa a Lee Myung Bak de la tragedia de Ryongsan
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- A traves de un comentario individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo que la tragedia de Ryongsan ocurrida en el Sur de Corea no fue un caso accidental sino la matanza causada por la gobernacion antipopular del fascista "poder pragmatista" de Lee Myung Bak.
					  Como ya trascendidos, el pasado 20 de enero, la policia armada y los "comandos" del Sur de Corea reprimieron salvajemente a los habitantes de Ryongsan, que protestaban el desalojamiento forzado, dejando como saldo 5 muertos quemados y decenas de lesionados.
					
					 Tras brindar detalles del motivo, el proceso y las circunstancias del incidente, Rodong Sinmun afirma que detras de eso esta el traidor Lee Myung Bak y prosigue:
					
					 En lugar de castigar a los asesinos, los compinches de la "Casa Azul" (Chongwadae) y del "Gran Partido Nacional" los amparan abiertamente y hablan descaradamente de las supuestas "fuerzas" que controlaron por detras a los protestantes.
					
					 Esto parte de la intencion criminal de salir ileso de ese caso distrayendo la mirada critica del pueblo sumamente indignado por el asesinato.
					
					 Al imputar a las victimas la responsabilidad por la muerte de los habitantes inocentes sin sentir ningun remordimiento, la banda de Lee Myung Bak revelo por si sola su actitud y posicion contra el pueblo.
					
					 Ya quedo evidenciado que la "politica pragmatista" del traidor Lee es la dominacion fascista, que ni siquiera toma en consideracion la vida y los intereses del pueblo, y la politica homicida que convierte todo el suelo surcoreano en la inhabitable tierra esteril de DDHH y en el sepulcro de la democracia.
					
					 La tragedia de Ryongsan hace a los habitantes surcoreanos volver a sacar la seria leccion de que bajo el "regimen pragmatista" de caracter fascista, ni siquiera pueden defender su vida lejos de realizar su ansiado deseo de la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 Llega al cielo el rencor de los habitantes surcoreanos hacia la banda de Lee, que gobierna contra ellos desde el primer dia de su mandato.
					
					 Esta horda ya no puede controlar al pueblo surcoreano ni con cualquier medida conciliatoria ni con la represion fascista.
